thread.title: Kareena Kapoor In Ae Dil Hai Mushkil?
thread.title_full: Kareena Kapoor In Ae Dil Hai Mushkil?

title: Kareena Kapoor In Ae Dil Hai Mushkil?
text:
Posted by: Vinod D'souza Published: Saturday, October 24, 2015, 18:19 [IST] 
Rumours were doing rounds that Kareena Kapoor , would do a cameo appearance for a song along with her husband Saif Ali Khan in Karan Johar 's, Ae Dil Hai Mushkil . The movie is star-studded and the list of actors is growing by the day. However, a source close to Kareena Kapoor has rubbished these rumours by saying Kareena will not be a part of the movie, the source was quoted as saying, "It is not true. She is not doing a song in the film. She has just wrapped up Dubai schedule of Ki and Ka. Besides this film she is busy with Udta Punjab and brand endorsements." 
Just a week ago, it was reported that Lisa Haydon, is roped in to play a short and interesting role in Ae Dil Hail Mushkil. 
Karan Johar, has included Fawad Khan and Imran Abbas Naqvi from Pakistan. Sunny Leone will also have a cameo appearance along with Ranbir Kapoor in Ae Dil Hai Mushkil. 
The lead actors of Ae Dil Hai Mushkil are Ranbir Kapoor, Aishwarya Rai and Anushka Sharma. For the first time in Bollywood cinema, Aishwarya and Anushka would play the role of siblings. 
Karan Johar may rope in few more amazing actors in Ae Dil Hai Mushkil. As of now, the team has wrapped up shooting in Vienna, and completed a shoot in Paris for a song.
